response.overview: The four people who escorted the princess back to Tiandu City found that the people in the city had changed, and the city was in chaos and people were worried. Even the young king began to show signs of change, and all the behind-the-scenes manipulators were the Regent and Kaloulou, and the two wanted to control the king by evil methods, but they were each a ghost. At the request of the princess, Sanhuo and others, in order to save the young king to protect the peace between ordinary people and aliens, they once again stepped into the vortex center of the conspiracy, and they smashed the shackles of Kalouro and allowed the civilians to return. To a happy and prosperous life.
response.title: The Lion War
